page.title: 09BOXFORD CHURCH Cont.
page.content:
Her favourite character is a little hedgehog called Miss Tiggywinkle,she is a character from one of the books by Beatrix Potter. At the front of the house (which is a Tudor house) there is a window and this is the window she puts her display in of all her wonderful soft toys.
Miss Osborne made most of the kneelers in Boxford Church, she started in 1978 and the first one she made had a picture of the first man on the moon. The materials used for the kneelers were given by a Hadleigh factory and the stuffing was given by a villager called Mr. E.A. Locke. There are 200 kneelers and each one is about an event which has happened over the last few years mainly about the village. About 30 people have helped Miss Osborne.
